Title: BAML integration
introduction:
We've partnered with Boundary (YC W23)! Now you can build your LLM app using BAML and monitor it with Keywords AI (YC W24). Simply create a Keywords AI client to get started. 

 BAML is a templating language for writing typed LLM functions, treating prompts as functions. Learn how to integrate: [BAML documentation](https://docs.keywordsai.co/integration/development-frameworks/baml).
